rename.from: Better Integration between cache and compress üöÄ
rename.to: üöÄ Better Integration between cache and compress

body:
The cache middleware does not check for the content encoding header, I fixed this in https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/1054
Expect a version tag today or tomorrow üëç

issue.title: Update module github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 to v2.20.2
issue.body:
[![WhiteSource Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Type | Update | Change |
|---|---|---|---|
| [github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber) | require | minor | `v2.0.2` -> `v2.20.2` |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>gofiber/fiber</summary>

### [`v2.20.2`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.20.2)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.20.1...v2.20.2)

#### üßπ Updates

-   Change default json lib. ([#​1563](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1563))

#### üêõ Fixes

-   Fix limit middleware skip options ([#​1568](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1568))
-   Fix macOs monitoring middleware: Add missing TargetConditionals.h include ([#​1572](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1572))

#### üìö Documentation

-   Fix typo ([#​1569](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1569))

Thank you [@​AliYusuf95](https://togithub.com/AliYusuf95), [@​aliereno](https://togithub.com/aliereno), [@​efectn](https://togithub.com/efectn) and [@​xwjdsh](https://togithub.com/xwjdsh) for making this update possible.

### [`v2.20.1`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.20.1)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.20.0...v2.20.1)

#### üêõ Fixes

-   v2.20.0 darwin bug fix to load_darwin.go ([#​1564](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1564))

### [`v2.20.0`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.20.0)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.19.0...v2.20.0)

#### üöÄ New

-   Support for sub fiber's error handlers ([#​1560](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1560))
-   Add function to override form decoder setting ([#​1100](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1100), [#​1555](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1555))
    https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#setparserdecoder
-   Support logging color for custom logging formats ([#​1513](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1513))
-   Feature: limiter middleware new skip options implemented ([#​1542](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1542))
    https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/limiter
-   Add one minute load avg for monitor middleware ([#​1530](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1530))

#### üßπ Updates

-   Add test case for QueryParser for SetParserDecoder ([#​1562](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1562))

#### üêõ Fixes

-   Register static file routing with trailing slash ([#​1556](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1556))
-   Static file routing path rewrite. ([#​1538](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1538))
-   Fix `c.OriginalURL()` changed after `SendFile` ([#​1553](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1553))
-   File opening path and directory browsing path of filesystem ([#​1547](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1547))

#### üìö Documentation

-   Update Spanish documentation ([#​1554](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1554))
-   Fix language mistakes in Turkish ([#​1552](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1552))
-   Translated some sentences for ja-version ([#​1551](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1551))
-   Update README with elastic/apmfiber middleware ([#​1540](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1540))

Thank you [@​Perniciosius](https://togithub.com/Perniciosius), [@​Unickorn](https://togithub.com/Unickorn), [@​aliereno](https://togithub.com/aliereno), [@​amalshaji](https://togithub.com/amalshaji), [@​efectn](https://togithub.com/efectn), [@​fufuok](https://togithub.com/fufuok), [@​ivanvc](https://togithub.com/ivanvc), [@​josebalius](https://togithub.com/josebalius), [@​ppmasa8](https://togithub.com/ppmasa8) and [@​rockcreation7](https://togithub.com/rockcreation7) for making this update possible.

### [`v2.19.0`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.19.0)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.18.0...v2.19.0)

#### üöÄ New

-   Add next support for Monitor middleware. ([#​1527](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1527))

#### üêõ Fixes

-   Get unexpected results from cache [#​1529](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1529) ([#​1531](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1531))
-   Fix Mutability issue of UserContext in fiber.Ctx ([#​1522](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1522))
-   Corrects ipv6 loopback ip shown on UI ([#​1517](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1517))

#### üìö Documentation

-   fixed translation issues and translate more area in turkish readme ([#​1525](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1525))
-   Translate `External Middleware` section of README to Chinese. ([#​1523](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1523))
-   Add Chinese translation for internal middleware ([#​1511](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1511))
-   Translate `Limitations` section of README to Chinese ([#​1510](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1510))
-   Translated limitation section ([#​1509](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1509))
-   Add Limitations section to README ([#​1508](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1508))

Thank you [@​Ja7ad](https://togithub.com/Ja7ad), [@​Lynicis](https://togithub.com/Lynicis), [@​Thammachart](https://togithub.com/Thammachart), [@​ZACHSTRIVES](https://togithub.com/ZACHSTRIVES), [@​efectn](https://togithub.com/efectn), [@​hi019](https://togithub.com/hi019), [@​j178](https://togithub.com/j178), [@​techytoes](https://togithub.com/techytoes) and [@​ut-zero](https://togithub.com/ut-zero) for making this update possible.

### [`v2.18.0`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.18.0)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.17.0...v2.18.0)

#### üöÄ New

-   Add encrypt cookies middleware ([#​1343](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1343))
    https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/encryptcookie
-   Add JSONDecoder to config ([#​1489](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1489))

#### üßπ Updates

-   Session should not regenerate the ID in case Get() returned nil ([#​1493](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1493))
-   Improve startup message tests ([#​1504](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1504))
-   Update fasthttp from v1.26 to v1.29 ([#​1503](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1503))
-   Add test run for go1.17 ([#​1501](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1501))

#### üêõ Fixes

-   panic: unaligned 64-bit atomic operation \[32 bit machines] [#​1487](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1487) ([#​1502](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1502))
-   ctx.BodyParser was not able to parse vendor specific content type ([#​1506](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1506))

Thank you [@​amir9480](https://togithub.com/amir9480), [@​natebwangsut](https://togithub.com/natebwangsut), [@​pd-pranay](https://togithub.com/pd-pranay) and [@​shirshendubhowmick](https://togithub.com/shirshendubhowmick) for making this update possible.

### [`v2.17.0`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.17.0)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.16.0...v2.17.0)

#### üöÄ New

-   Feature: Add Skip middleware ([#​1465](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1465))
    https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/skip
-   \[Logger]: Add tag for response header ([#​1446](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1446))

#### üßπ Updates

-   Refactor: Remove use of deprecated functions ([#​1474](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1474))

#### üêõ Fixes

-   Fix `route.Path` on copy ([#​1471](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1471))
-   Fix: Fiber Client does multiple requests when using Timeout() and MaxRedirectsCount() [#​1457](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1457) ([#​1464](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1464))

#### üìö Documentation

Thank you [@​ProExpertProg](https://togithub.com/ProExpertProg), [@​andrascz](https://togithub.com/andrascz), [@​goldwind-ting](https://togithub.com/goldwind-ting), [@​pcen](https://togithub.com/pcen), [@​pd-pranay](https://togithub.com/pd-pranay) and [@​thinklucrative](https://togithub.com/thinklucrative) for making this update possible.

#### üöÄ New

#### üêõ Fixes

-   Fix: The escape of special characters in route path does not work properly [#​1454](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1454) ([#​1462](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1462))

#### üìö Documentation

### [`v2.3.0`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.3.0)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.2.5...v2.3.0)

## üî• **New**

```go
app.ListenTLS(":443", "./cert.pem", "./cert.key");
```

Allows you to serve HTTPs requests by providing a path to the TLS certificate and key file, this is a simplified method for `app.Listener()` where you had to build your own `*tls.Config`. [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1077](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1077)

The following `*tls.Config` is used:

```go
&tls.Config{
	MinVersion:               tls.VersionTLS12,
	PreferServerCipherSuites: true,
	Certificates: []tls.Certificate{
		cert,
	},
}
```

More information about Listen methods can be found here https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#listentls

Thank you [@​kiyonlin](https://togithub.com/kiyonlin) & [@​HeCorr](https://togithub.com/HeCorr)

-   Improve [round2 performance](https://togithub.com/valyala/fasthttp/commit/cb0aaaa2668c0ca09a72e1fdbf0774d79290ecf2) in fh
-   Refactor `BodyParser` [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/1073](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/1073)

-   Remove redundant validation for `CacheDuration` in `Static` [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/1069](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/1069)
-   `BodyParser` returns an `ErrUnprocessableEntity` when an invalid content-type is present. [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1067](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/1067)

### [`v2.0.3`](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/v2.0.3)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3)

## üî• **New**

-   **app.Mount** allows to *mount* a fiber instance. [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/737](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/737) [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/737](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/737)

```go
func (a *App) Mount(prefix string, app *fiber.App) fiber.Router
```

```go
micro := fiber.New()
micro.Get("/doe", func(c *fiberCtx) error {
	return c.SendStatus(StatusOK)
})

app := fiber.New()
app.Mount("/john", micro) // GET /john/doe -> 200 OK
```

-   **utils.UnsafeString** replaces **utils.GetString** [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/833](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/833)
-   **utils.UnsafeBytes** replaces **utils.GetBytes** [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/833](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/833)
-   [**middleware/cache**](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/tree/master/middleware/cache) middleware introduction by [@​codemicro](https://togithub.com/codemicro) [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/829](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/829)

## üßπ **Updates**

-   **csrf** middleware now sets `SameSite=Lax` by default [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/825](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/825)
-   **c.QueryParser** now supports splitting comma-separated values into slices [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/817](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/817) [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/782](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/782)

## ü©π **Fixes**

-   avoid duplicated slashes on static directories [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/819](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/819)
-   proxy middleware is now able to upgrade from http -> https scheme's [https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/836](https://togithub.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/836)
